languages.text: {n}Невозмутимое выражение Хейнрикса на мгновение меняется, являя миру нечто потаенное, темное и жестокое.{/n} "Благодарю за содействие, Лорд-капитан. Я лично избавлю мир от этой падали — сразу после того, как проведу пристрастное дознание по ряду вопросов".

traits.locale_text: {n}Невозмутимое выражение Хейнрикса на мгновение меняется, являя миру нечто потаенное, темное и жестокое.{/n} "Благодарю за содействие, Лорд-капитан. Я лично избавлю мир от этой падали — сразу после того, как проведу пристрастное дознание по ряду вопросов".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix's imperturbable expression instantly changes to something secret, dark, and harsh.{/n} "Thank you for your cooperation, Lord Captain. I will personally rid the universe of this carrion — just as soon as I have conducted a highly prejudicial and wide-ranging interrogation."

I will personally rid the universe of this carrion — just as soon as I have conducted a highly prejudicial and wide-ranging interrogation."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}La imperturbable expresión de Heinrix se troca al instante en un rictus de complicidad, siniestro y severo.{/n} «Gracias por su cooperación, Lord Capitán. Yo mismo libraré al universo de esta carroña tan pronto haya completado un exhaustivo y pernicioso interrogatorio».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's imperturbable expression instantly changes to something secret, dark, and harsh.{/n} "Thank you for your cooperation, Lord Captain. I will personally rid the universe of this carrion — just as soon as I have conducted a highly prejudicial and wide-ranging interrogation."

traits.locale_text: {n}La imperturbable expresión de Heinrix se troca al instante en un rictus de complicidad, siniestro y severo.{/n} «Gracias por su cooperación, Lord Capitán. Yo mismo libraré al universo de esta carroña tan pronto haya completado un exhaustivo y pernicioso interrogatorio».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの平静を装った表情が、一瞬にして秘密めいた暗く厳しいものに変わった。{/n}「協力いただきありがとう、ロード・キャプテン。偏見に満ちた広範な尋問を実施次第、俺が個人的にこの腐敗者を宇宙から駆除しよう」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's imperturbable expression instantly changes to something secret, dark, and harsh.{/n} "Thank you for your cooperation, Lord Captain. I will personally rid the universe of this carrion — just as soon as I have conducted a highly prejudicial and wide-ranging interrogation."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの平静を装った表情が、一瞬にして秘密めいた暗く厳しいものに変わった。{/n}「協力いただきありがとう、ロード・キャプテン。偏見に満ちた広範な尋問を実施次第、俺が個人的にこの腐敗者を宇宙から駆除しよう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希脸上平静的表情立刻变得神秘、阴暗，而又冷酷。{/n}“感谢你的合作，舰长大人。我会进行一场充满偏见、涉猎广泛的审讯，之后会亲手把那块烂肉从这个宇宙中铲除。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's imperturbable expression instantly changes to something secret, dark, and harsh.{/n} "Thank you for your cooperation, Lord Captain. I will personally rid the universe of this carrion — just as soon as I have conducted a highly prejudicial and wide-ranging interrogation."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希脸上平静的表情立刻变得神秘、阴暗，而又冷酷。{/n}“感谢你的合作，舰长大人。我会进行一场充满偏见、涉猎广泛的审讯，之后会亲手把那块烂肉从这个宇宙中铲除。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le visage habituellement imperturbable d'Heinrix affiche instantanément un air secret, sombre et dur.{/n} « Merci de votre coopération, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je débarrasserai personnellement l'univers de cette charogne, dès que je lui aurai fait subir un interrogatoire aussi complet que dommageable sur le plan personnel. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's imperturbable expression instantly changes to something secret, dark, and harsh.{/n} "Thank you for your cooperation, Lord Captain. I will personally rid the universe of this carrion — just as soon as I have conducted a highly prejudicial and wide-ranging interrogation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage habituellement imperturbable d'Heinrix affiche instantanément un air secret, sombre et dur.{/n} « Merci de votre coopération, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je débarrasserai personnellement l'univers de cette charogne, dès que je lui aurai fait subir un interrogatoire aussi complet que dommageable sur le plan personnel. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' unerschütterliche Miene ändert sich schlagartig zu etwas Geheimnisvollem, Dunklem und Rauem.{/n} "Danke für Eure Kooperation, Lord Captain. Ich werde das Universum persönlich von diesem Aas befreien — sobald ich ein extrem unerquickliches und intensives Verhör durchgeführt habe."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's imperturbable expression instantly changes to something secret, dark, and harsh.{/n} "Thank you for your cooperation, Lord Captain. I will personally rid the universe of this carrion — just as soon as I have conducted a highly prejudicial and wide-ranging interrogation."

Ich werde das Universum persönlich von diesem Aas befreien — sobald ich ein extrem unerquickliches und intensives Verhör durchgeführt habe."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's imperturbable expression instantly changes to something secret, dark, and harsh.{/n} "Thank you for your cooperation, Lord Captain. I will personally rid the universe of this carrion — just as soon as I have conducted a highly prejudicial and wide-ranging interrogation."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in soğukkanlı çehresi bir anda gizemli, karanlık ve katı bir hâl alıyor.{/n} "İş birliğine minnettarım Lord Kaptan. Evreni bu parazitten bizzat arındıracağım. Son derece ön yargılı ve kapsamlı bir sorgulamanın akabinde elbette..."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's imperturbable expression instantly changes to something secret, dark, and harsh.{/n} "Thank you for your cooperation, Lord Captain. I will personally rid the universe of this carrion — just as soon as I have conducted a highly prejudicial and wide-ranging interrogation."

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
